meanings.definition: Stuccoes: Plural form of stucco, a type of plaster used for coating walls and ceilings.
meanings.sent1: The stuccoes on the walls gave the house a smooth and elegant look.
meanings.sent2: The workers applied stuccoes to the ceiling to cover up the imperfections.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left paw prints in the wet stuccoes on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like fresh stuccoes, covering any cracks of sadness.
meanings.sent5: The artist skillfully molded the stuccoes into intricate designs.

meanings.definition: Stuccoes: Third person singular form of stucco, to coat or decorate with stucco.
meanings.sent1: He stuccoes the exterior of the house to protect it from the weather.
meanings.sent2: She stuccoes the garden wall to give it a rustic appearance.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully stuccoes the cake with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: Time stuccoes memories in our minds, preserving them like ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully stuccoes the sculpture, adding depth and texture.
